channel.title: Mod > Admin
channel.description: Ok I Have A Mod On My Server And His user is 0wna32m4x I want to make a way so when i log off he becomes a Admin and when i log on he becomes a mod. Is It Possible???

item.title: Mod > Admin
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

This MEans Everytime you log off he will not to logoff and everytime you login he will not log off so you can admin again so he can revert back to mod? whats the piont in that why dont you make him co -owner?
like player rights 3 and player rights 4? (Yep It Is Real Ask The Modertors)
